Questions: How to set up a password ?
Answers: User will receive the link in their registered email . While clicking on the link user will reach the screen to set up a password. Password should contain 8 characters, one upper case , one lower case letter , one number and one special character.
Path: Link in Email -> Set Your Password ? Enter New Password ? Click on Set Password button ? Updated Password Screen ? Click on Login button

Questions: How can I reset my password if I forget it?
My verification email says the link has expired. What should I do?
